text: -vaina#M dEqvata#yAq pra pA#dayaqtyadi#tyAqH sadOq&syadi#tyAqH sadaq A sIqdEtyA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitad-yaja#mAnOq vA Eqtasya# puqrA gOqptA Ba#vatyEqSha vO# dEva savitaqH sOmaq ityA#ha saviqtRupra#sUta Eqvaina#M dEqvatA$ByaqH saM praya#cCatyEqtat tva(gm) sO#ma dEqvO dEqvAnupA#gAq ityA#ha dEqvO hyE#Sha san- [  ] 10
